summary: Timeline_13 documents managing panic disorder and agoraphobia with professional help.

posts.text: My partner and I have been fighting constantly. I'm worthless and pathetic I feel like I'm ruining everything. I've been drinking to cope We decided to try couples therapy. did some self-care activities Had our first session and it went better than expected. I deserve to get better
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Thought I was getting better but I'm not. I have no reason to keep going Back to square one. I stopped taking my medication Reminded myself that recovery isn't linear. tried a new coping mechanism Reaching out for support instead of giving up. I deserve to get better
maladaptive_evidence: I have no reason to keep going
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Three weeks without self-harming. tried a new coping mechanism So proud of myself. Taking it one day at a time Almost slipped up. I deserve to suffer But I reached out for help instead. Taking it one day at a time
adaptive_evidence: Taking it one day at a time
posts.summary: Post shows active coping and progress despite challenges

posts.text: Can't even do basic tasks today. I have no reason to keep going I haven't showered in a week Managed to shower and eat breakfast. tried a new coping mechanism Small steps are still steps forward. I deserve to get better
maladaptive_evidence: I have no reason to keep going
I haven't showered in a week
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: My anxiety has been through the roof. I hate myself so much I had a panic attack at work yesterday. I'm spiraling out of control But I've been practicing the breathing exercises joined a support group and it's starting to help. I'm building a support system
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Feeling hopeful for the first time in months. called the crisis hotline I'm worth the effort Had a bad moment yesterday. I'm a burden to everyone But I worked through it using my tools. I'm worth the effort
posts.summary: Post shows active coping and progress despite challenges

posts.text: Side effects are awful. I feel empty inside I pushed everyone away Sticking with it because my doctor said it takes time. went for a walk to clear my head Noticing small improvements in my mood. I'm worth the effort
adaptive_evidence: went for a walk to clear my head
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Everything feels hopeless lately. I'm broken beyond repair I can barely get myself out of bed most days. I can't get out of bed anymore Today though, I managed to reached out for help which is a small victory.
maladaptive_evidence: I can't get out of bed anymore
posts.summary: Post primarily shows distress with some coping attempts

posts.text: My anxiety has been through the roof. I have no reason to keep going I had a panic attack at work yesterday. I can't see a future for myself But I've been practicing the breathing exercises asked for support and it's starting to help. I'm building a support system

I can't see a future for myself

posts.text: The depression is getting worse. I'm disgusting I've been drinking to cope I know I need help so I reached out for help My therapist suggested I'm learning to be kinder to myself
adaptive_evidence: I'm learning to be kinder to myself
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I feel so alone. I feel empty inside Nobody understands what I'm going through. I gave up trying Decided to join a support group. went for a walk to clear my head Met some people who actually get it. I acknowledge my progress
adaptive_evidence: went for a walk to clear my head
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Feeling hopeful for the first time in months. asked for support I'm worth the effort Had a bad moment yesterday. I have no reason to keep going But I worked through it using my tools. I'm worth the effort

posts.text: Had a really bad day after weeks of progress. Everyone would be better off without me I can't get out of bed anymore Using my coping skills instead of old habits. practiced my coping strategies This setback doesn't erase my progress. I'm learning healthier coping skills
maladaptive_evidence: Everyone would be better off without me

posts.text: Thinking about stopping my meds. I feel completely hopeless I hurt myself again Called my psychiatrist first. called the crisis hotline We're trying a different medication instead. I'm not giving up
